FOUND IN: Pluto: In Roman mythology, this deity is similar to Hades and represents the god of wealth and agriculture but also ruled the underworld.

FOUND IN: Quaking aspen: This species, known scientifically as Populus tremuloides, is commonly referred to as the quaking aspen due to its leaves' ability to shake and quiver in response to even slight breezes.
